M

main(String[]) - Static method in class framework.Framework
Start one mix.
main(String...) - Static method in class framework.Mix
Creates a new Mix.
main(String[]) - Static method in class gui.MixGUI
Main method to display the Mix GUI
mainPanel - Variable in class gui.MixGUI
 
mergeArrays(byte[], byte[]) - Static method in class framework.Util
Merges the bypassed byte arrays (secondArray is appended to firstArray).
message - package message
Provides different message formats, the InputOutputHandler is capable of transmitting.
Message - Class in message
Basic abstract class for all types of messages the InputOutputHandler is capable of transmitting.
Message(byte[], User, int, int, Mix) - Constructor for class message.Message
Message constructor used by mix.
Message(byte[], Mix) - Constructor for class message.Message
Message constructor used by client.
messageID - Variable in class message.Message
Identifier for this message.
MessagePartHasWrongSizeException - Exception in exception
Exception thrown when a MessagePart that shall be assigned is of wrong size.
MessagePartHasWrongSizeException() - Constructor for exception exception.MessagePartHasWrongSizeException
Constructs a MessagePartHasWrongSizeException (empty constructor).
messageProcessor - package messageProcessor
MessageProcessor component - Takes messages from component InputOutputHandler, processes them (recoding, checking for replays, removing/adding padding, initiating message authentication) and bypasses them to component OutputStrategy.
messageProcessor - Variable in class framework.Controller
 
messageProcessor - Variable in class framework.Implementation
 
messageProcessor - Variable in class framework.Mix
 
MessageProcessorController - Class in messageProcessor
Controller class of component MessageProcessor.
MessageProcessorController(Mix) - Constructor for class messageProcessor.MessageProcessorController
Generates a new MessageProcessor component, which takes messages from component InputOutputHandler, processes them (recoding, checking for replays, removing/adding padding, initiating message authentication) and bypasses them to the OutputStrategy component.
messageProcessorImplementation - Variable in class messageProcessor.MessageProcessorController
the messageProcessorImplementation stores the actual implementation of the messageProcessor
MessageProcessorInterface - Interface in architectureInterface
Architecture interface for component MessageProcessor.
mix - Variable in class framework.Controller
 
mix - Variable in class framework.Implementation
 
Mix - Class in framework
This class coordinates the components of this mix.
Mix() - Constructor for class framework.Mix
Constructor for the Mix, this constructor contains all steps to start mixing traffic.
MixComponent - Enum in gui
This enum stores all Component names of a mix and is used to build the GUI.
MixComponent() - Constructor for enum gui.MixComponent
 
mixComponent - Variable in class gui.MixPanel
 
MixComponents - Static variable in class gui.MixGUI
 
MixGUI - Class in gui
Graphical Front end and configuration utility for the mix framework
MixGUI() - Constructor for class gui.MixGUI
Constructor, which set the look and feel, loads the super() constructor and initializes the GUI
MixGUI.OpenListener - Class in gui
ActionListener for loading an existing mix configuration
MixGUI.SaveListener - Class in gui
ActionListener for saving the mix configuration
MixGUI.ValidateListener - Class in gui
ActionListener for the validation of a combination of several mix components
MixPanel - Class in gui
The MixPanel is a JPanel which contains all information on a component of the mix.
MixPanel(MixComponent) - Constructor for class gui.MixPanel
for every component of the mix, one MixPanel is added to the GUI
MixPanel.ChoiceListener - Class in gui
ActionListener that is called, when a component is chosen in a file dialog.
MixProperties - Class in framework
Provides methods to load properties from a file and to convert property keys to different formats.
MixProperties() - Constructor for class framework.MixProperties
Create an empty MixProperties-object.
MixProperties(Properties) - Constructor for class framework.MixProperties
Create a MixProperties-object based on a standard Java Properties-object.
mixProperties - Variable in class gui.MixPanel
